text: James C. Weaver (March 5, 1945 â€“ July 2, 2015) was an American college athletics administrator and former American football player and coach. He most recently served as the athletics director at Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, from 1997 to 2014. Weaver was born in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. He died of Parkinson's disease in Blacksburg, Virginia, aged 70. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Virginia Category:Sportspeople from Virginia Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:People from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania Category:People from Blacksburg, Virginia
title: James C. Weaver
